biotools.summary: alntools processes next-generation sequencing read alignments into a sparse compressed incidence matrix (aka Equivalence Classes) and stores it in a pre-defined binary format for efficient downstream analyses and storage. It enables us to compare, contrast, or combine the results of different alignment strategies.

bioschemas.name: alntools
